RICHARDSON
v.
BANK OF AMERICA. No. 240PA07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 26, 2007. John H. Culver, III, Amy Pritchard Williams, Charlotte, Walter E. Dellinger, III, Washington, DC, McGlinchey Stafford, Anthony J. Rollo, Daniel T. Plunkett, New Orleans, LA, for Bank of America, NationsCredit Financial. John Alan Jones, G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Richardson, et al. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Jack L. Cozort, Eileen R. Youens, Raleigh, for N.C. Chamber.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of September 2007 by Amicus Curiae (CCIA) for Leave to Amend Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of September 2007."
